Attribute.description: The snapshot attribute to modify.  Only volume creation permissions may be modified at the customer level.

CreateVolumePermission.description: A JSON representation of the snapshot attribute modification.

DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

GroupNames.description: The group to modify for the snapshot.

OperationType.description: The type of operation to perform to the attribute.

UserIds.description: The account ID to modify for the snapshot.
